EditProfile.name: Name
EditProfile.DesactivarcuentaTexto: If you deactivate your account, it will no longer be available. You will not be able to log in and access your profile. All the opinions, photos and advice you have specifically provided appeared on the website.

Help.EnviamosmailText: Write to our customer service department
Help.EnvianosWhatsAppText: Written directly and quickly, one of our representatives will attend you shortly
